messageBody:
I have much more to learn, but after much struggling and HELP, I have
JUnit and ANT working together.

I am working in a Windows environment and set environmental variables:

set ANT_HOME=D:\JAVADevEnv\Tools\apache-ant-1.6.2
set JAVA_HOME=D:/JAVADevEnv/SDKs/j2sdk-1_4_2_04-windows-i586

set
Path=C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT;C:\WINNT\System32\Wbem;D:\JAVADevEnv\SDKs\j2sdk-1_4_2_04-windows-i586\lib;%ANT_HOME%\bin


The build file that is working for me is:

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<project name="JunitDemoWithTests2" default="deploy" >
<property name="HOME" value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Source" />
<property name="SDKS_HOME" value="D:/JAVADevEnv/SDKs" />
<property name="JAVA_HOME"
value="D:/JAVADevEnv/SDKs/j2sdk-1_4_2_04-windows-i586" />
<property name="CVSROOT" value="D:/JAVADevEnv/CVS" />
<property name="TOOLS_HOME" value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools" />
<property name="ANT_HOME"
value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools/apache-ant-1.6.2" />
<property name="JUNIT_HOME"
value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools/JUnit/junit3.8.1" />
<property name="CATALINA_HOME"
value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.25" />
<property name="HTTPUNIT_HOME"
value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools/HTTPUnit/httpunit-1.6" />
<property name="MYSQL_HOME" value="D:/JAVADevEnv/Tools/mysql" />

<target name="init">
<mkdir dir="build/classes" />
<mkdir dir="dist" />
<echo>init complete!</echo>
</target>

<target name="test-init">
<mkdir dir="test/classes" />
<echo>test-init complete!</echo>
</target>

<target name="compile" depends="init,test-init">
<javac fork="yes" srcdir="src" destdir="build/classes" >
<classpath>
<pathelement path="${JAVA_HOME}/bin" />
<pathelement location="${JAVA_HOME}/bin/javac.exe" />
<pathelement path="${JAVA_HOME}/lib" />
</classpath>
</javac>
<echo>compilation complete!</echo>
</target>

<target name="test-compile" depends="test-init,compile">
<javac fork="yes" srcdir="TestSrc" includes="**/*.java"
destdir="test/classes" >
<classpath>
<pathelement path="${JAVA_HOME}/bin" />
<pathelement location="${JAVA_HOME}/bin/javac.exe" />
<pathelement path="${JAVA_HOME}/lib" />
<pathelement location="${JUNIT_HOME}/junit.jar" />
<pathelement location="build/classes" />
<pathelement location="test/classes" />
</classpath>
</javac>
<echo>JUnit Test-compile complete!</echo>
</target>

<target name="unit-test" depends="test-compile">
<junit printsummary="true" haltonfailure="true" >
<classpath>
<pathelement path="build/classes" />
<pathelement path="test/classes" />
</classpath>
<batchtest fork="yes" >
<formatter type="plain" usefile="false" />
<fileset dir="test/classes">
<include name="AllTests.class" />
<include name="SimpleFractionTest.class" />
</fileset>
</batchtest>
</junit>
<echo>junit-run complete!</echo>
</target>

<target name="deploy" depends="compile,test-compile,unit-test,doc">
<jar destfile="dist/project.jar" basedir="build/classes" />
<echo>deploy complete!</echo>
</target>
</project>


I hope this helps you.

Clark Anderson
